what: Hash columns in a data frame — hash_df
title: Hash columns in a data frame — hash_df
text: function hash_df accepts data frame performs MD5 column using openssl package. original column names md5 hash checksums returned dataframe.

title: Hash columns in a data frame — hash_df
code: hash_df(iris[1]) #>    column_name                             hash #> 1 Sepal.Length 42e9d619905e04e31234f7b694eb40be hash_df(iris) #>    column_name                             hash #> 1 Sepal.Length 42e9d619905e04e31234f7b694eb40be #> 2  Sepal.Width 09690fcb23119f3fdedbbe2c2b679dc5 #> 3 Petal.Length 9a049d416b3ee2eec643b3e9950390e7 #> 4  Petal.Width 9de985a629564fa6f131344f94224e39 #> 5      Species b2c5136891d35a23f462677d9e579693
